channel.title: Dimitris Glezos' old personal site - quote

item.title: Quote
item.description:
Holy God. This is going to change my life in a zillion different ways. I must be nuts.

— Sofia, Vanilla Sky
item.dc:creator: glezos-blog

item.title: Quote
item.description:
Luck is statistics taken personally.

— Penn Jillette
item.dc:creator: glezos-blog

item.title: Quote
item.description:
The longest journey is the journey inward, for he who has chosen his destiny has started upon his quest for the source of his being.

— Dag Hammarskjöld
item.dc:creator: glezos-blog

item.title: Quote
item.description:
All I want more than anything is to work with people who give a fuck as much as I do.

— Marcus 'djWHEAT' Graham
item.dc:creator: glezos-blog

item.title: Quote
item.description:
The pines were roaring on the height.. The winds were moaning in the night.. The trees like torches blazed with light..

— The Hobbit
item.dc:creator: glezos-blog

item.title: Quote
item.description: The most important piece of advice I can give you on the path to happiness, is not just be yourself, but be your weird self. It takes too much energy to be other than your weird self. We spend so much of our lives living up to the expectations of …
item.dc:creator: glezos-blog

item.title: Quote
item.description: I believe that love that is true and real creates a respite from death. All cowardice comes from not loving or not loving well, which is the same thing. And when the man who is brave and true looks death squarely in the face like some rhino hunters I know …
item.dc:creator: glezos-blog

item.title: Quote
item.description:
There's only so much spiciness baba ghanoush and fresh tomato can cover.

—
item.dc:creator: glezos-blog

item.title: Quote
item.description:
The thing about quotes on the Internet is that you cannot confirm their validity.

— Abraham Lincoln
item.dc:creator: glezos-blog

item.title: Quote
item.description:
There is no opponent. Because the word "I" does not exist.

A good fight should be like a small play, but played seriously. A good martial artist does not become tense, but ready. Not thinking, yet not dreaming. Ready for whatever may come. When the opponent expands, I contract. When …
item.dc:creator: glezos-blog
